definitions.definition: The act of inaugurating , or inducting into office with solemnity ; investiture by appropriate ceremonies .
The formal beginning, initiation , or entry into service of any movement, enterprise, building, event , etc.
examples: The inauguration of the new bar was a success, with plenty of discounts.

main_definition: The act of inaugurating , or inducting into office with solemnity ; investiture by appropriate ceremonies .
secondary_definitions: The formal beginning, initiation , or entry into service of any movement, enterprise, building, event , etc.
